name: 恋色マジカルフライト

artists: Satsuki ga Tenkomori/さつき が てんこもり [A L]

touhouOrigin.touhouSong: 恋色マスタースパーク

links.displayName: 恋色マジカルフライト

description: If you're confused as to why there is an almost 2 month difference between the release date of some Reitaisai 8 albums, it is because that on March 11th, 2011 Japan was hit by the Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami. The most severe earthquake in Japan's history, it was a magnitude 9.1 and the resultant tsunami caused the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster. Because of this event, Reitaisai 8 was canceled and later rescheduled for May.
